DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if two-weeks of dosing with thiamphenicol is safe and is able to change the levels of certain pre-specified biomarkers in nervous tissue taken from the nasal passages.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Thiamphenicol on EAAT2 and Other Biomarkers From Nasal Biopsied Tissue
DOC.detailed_description: Thiamphenicol has been proposed to increase the levels of the excitatory amino acid transporter 2 (EAAT2) in the nervous tissue. This study evaluated the ability of two weeks of treatment with thiamphenicol to increase EAAT2 in a nasal biopsy as a surrogate of brain nervous tissue.
DOC.criteria: normal volunteers less than 18 years older than 55 years
